input_text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to see page likes on facebook?
input_text.Response A: To see your page likes on Facebook, go to your Facebook page and click on the 'Likes' button in the left-hand menu. From there, you can see the total number of likes your page has, as well as a breakdown of where those likes are coming from. You can also access a more detailed view by clicking on 'See All' under the 'Likes' button.
input_text.Response B: Sure, you can do this from the facebook app or website.  If you’re using the app, you can click on the “Like” button next to any post, and you’ll see the number of people who have liked the post.  If you’re using the website, you can click on the “Like” button next to any post, and you’ll see the number of people who have liked the post, as well as the number of people who have shared the post.  You can also click on the “Like” button next to your own profile picture, and you’ll see the number of people who have liked your profile picture.  You can also click on the “Like” button next to a page, and you’ll see the number of people who have liked the page.
